alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 2:53AM AKDT until March 15 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow continuing. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Upper Lynn Canal including Haines and Skagway. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Plan on slippery roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be light and periodic to start, but then increase Monday evening and overnight. For the Haines area, greatest amounts are expected along the Chilkat Peninsula.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
